card.card:
{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"总是忍不住思考，为什么是你作为主角。并非对你有过疑虑，只是慨叹你确实有一种力量，让人觉得“就是你”。
如果只是因为你能够逆天改命扭转乾坤，那反倒乏味了。而始终不放弃的、甚至可以称为固执的精神，怕更加符合大家心头的期望。
今后也会继续追随着你天成的气质，对你，还有你身旁的大家深信不疑。
生日快乐呀，爱城华恋同学。🎂[害羞]","id":92492035,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1478,"img_size":332.16,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/fb6a2418f3253d73e03e404c325a8247d2be135e.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1108},{"img_height":2048,"img_size":291.67,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/a70f00c63ebe435d27d4561570391d199f21de53.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1536},{"img_height":1500,"img_size":464.38,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/477ac8fa202bf35cc46c5ee22788926c23150005.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2000},{"img_height":640,"img_size":110.5,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/72a051499af2d3ae79d42721b1805bea5a5f0631.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":432,"img_size":62.3,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/d2f1556e75247aecaf2da1aeef8e2a9c96b0da46.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":768},{"img_height":852,"img_size":233.54,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/57d2dcf562034c66db2d4c5ed20692eeb10e8b21.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1136},{"img_height":852,"img_size":228.87,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/76d360262c7567e677923ee27fa0f4f821fc7355.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1136},{"img_height":852,"img_size":228.28,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/63d650d3de465474ead16cf3657811cc72c9e5ec.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1136},{"img_height":852,"img_size":215.36,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/3d3eb4ae6b51403ad5d62abda14400037bf29653.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1136}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":88,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1601200041},"user":{"head_url":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
